comment.author: 56922921@N08
comment._content: I don't think it's a Hardee hat. Hardee hats have flat brims and the tops aren't pork-pied like that.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
roseco01:

That's a good observation. The Hardee hats were more typically as you describe, so we will need to look further into it and adjust the description if needed.  Thanks for your comment!
